categories: Cap Cool Daily Long Sleeve Graphic Shirt
description:
A do-it-all long sleeve tee that you can live in all summer. The performance-knit fabric wicks sweat and moves with you to keep you comfortable in a range of temperatures. With UPF 50+ sun protection, the Capilene Cool Daily Graphic Shirt will become your go-to shirt for sunny paddling trips, above-treeline hikes and exposed scrambles.Made of recycled polyester that's stretchy for extra comfort.Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection.Polygiene® permanent odour control finish keeps you fresh on multi-day trips or long stretches without access to laundry.miDori™ bioSoft finish adds softness and improves wicking.

        Sustainability
